Press Releases

Rep. Zeldin Champions Bipartisan Legislation To Reverse IRS Ruling Taxing Suffolk Residents For Septic System Upgrade Grants Link: /media-center/press-releases/rep-zeldin-champions-bipartisan-legislation-reverse-irs-ruling-taxing

June 22, 2020 Press Release Link: /media-center/press-releases

PATCHOGUE, NY – Congressman Lee Zeldin (R, NY-1), member of the House Financial Services Committee, joined Congressman Tom Suozzi (D, NY-3) in championing legislation (H.R. 7280), which would undo a ruling by the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) that Suffolk County residents are liable to pay taxes on county grants used to upgrade their aging septic tanks. 

Fire Island to Moriches Inlet Stabilization Project Sand Placement Complete Link: /media-center/press-releases/fire-island-moriches-inlet-stabilization-project-sand-placement-complete

June 11, 2020 Press Release Link: /media-center/press-releases

PATCHOGUE, NY - Today, Congressman Lee Zeldin (R, NY-1) announced that the final sand placement for the Army Corps of Engineers’ Fire Island to Moriches Inlet Stabilization Project was completed by Weeks Marine.

Rep. Zeldin Champions Great American Outdoors Act to Permanently Fund LWCF Link: /media-center/press-releases/rep-zeldin-champions-great-american-outdoors-act-permanently-fund-lwcf

June 10, 2020 Press Release Link: /media-center/press-releases

WASHINGTON - Congressman Lee Zeldin (R, NY-1) and a bipartisan group of his colleagues just introduced the Great American Outdoors Act(H.R. 7092) to fully and permanently fund the Land and Water Conservation Fund (LWCF) and address priority repair needs in our national parks and other land management agencies.

Rep. Zeldin Calls for House Passage of Bill to Provide First Responders, Medical Professionals Tax Break Amid Coronavirus Link: /media-center/press-releases/rep-zeldin-calls-house-passage-bill-provide-first-responders-medical

June 3, 2020 Press Release Link: /media-center/press-releases

WASHINGTON - Congressman Lee Zeldin (R, NY-1), member of the bipartisan Congressional Coronavirus Task Force and Opening Up America Again Congressional Group, is calling for House passage of the Helping Emergency Responders Overcome Emergency Situations Act (H.R. 6433), which he cosponsors.

June 2, 2020 Press Release Link: /media-center/press-releases

Congratulations to Victoria Havens, the first place winner of the 2020 Congressional Art Competition for the First Congressional District.
